name: Best American Sniper - Aim and Shoot To Kill Enemy Soldiers
name_original: Best American Sniper - Aim and Shoot To Kill Enemy Soldiers
description:
Shoot all the evil soldiers using your Sniping Skills

Now its time to take the fight to the enemy, use you sniper shooting skills to eliminate all the enemy forces soldiers in the city and restore the peace in the city. Shoot all the patrolling enemies in the area in limited time window to clear the waves and play multiple waves in the location. Sharpen your sniping skill in the beautiful night city environment. Shoot and eliminate all the soldiers to obtain the bonus points in the waves.

Some of the game features are:

- Multiple waves in a location
- Bonus achievements
- Kill using the single head shot
- Multiple weapons in the game
- Much more…

Like the game share with others, lets us know your thoughts all the feedback and positive criticism will be appreciated.
